title: Jack Teixeira, Airman Accused of Leaking Documents, Has History of Racist and Violent Remarks, Filing Says

last_post.content:
The Times has this story about new discoveries in the case of Airman Jack Teixeira. It’s excellent. But the lede is that he has a “troubling” history of making racist remarks.

Now look what’s in paragraphs 21-23. Is it possible they missed the lede?

title: Grièvement blessée par un tir de LBD en 2018 à Bordeaux, une passante jugée responsable de son "imprudence"

last_post.content: "Alors que la famille décide de rentrer en évitant le centre-ville où se déroule la manifestation, cette maman est néanmoins victime d’un tir de LBD déclenché par un CRS. Les séquelles de cette fracture d’une cervicale lui ont fait perdre son travail. Pourtant, le tribunal administratif de Bordeaux a rendu son verdict : la victime est jugée responsable de sa blessure à hauteur de 25%, "ayant commis une imprudence fautive" : être au mauvais endroit, au mauvais moment" 😯 https://rue89bordeaux.com/2023/04/grievement-blessee-par-un-tir-de-lbd-en-2018-a-bordeaux-passante-jugee-responsable-de-son-imprudence/

title: Intel reports largest quarterly loss in company history

last_post.content:
Wintel is truly dead. Microsoft recorded $18B in profits in Q1 while Intel recorded its largest quarterly loss of all time with -$2.8B lost in Q1.

Microsoft and Intel's fortunes have now diverged. Microsoft is now a cloud company and Intel's left behind.

title: Slashie unboxes - Nintendo Family Basic from 1984 and also peruses its manual!

last_post.content: Checking out the cool #Nintendo Family #BASIC peripheral for the #Famicom, and trying to figure out a bit of its manual! Please let me know in the comments if you want me to create something using it! #Retrogames https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fASHXlY7kTc

In the alpha-beta file

https://www.cs.bham.ac.uk/~mhe/TypeTopology/Games.alpha-beta.html

we show several ways to achieve alpha-beta pruning with the selection and quantifier monads.

Moreover, we compare the efficiency of these options by computing optimal outcomes and optimal plays of tic-tac-toe.

At the end of the above alpha-beta file, we include timings obtained by compiling Agda to machine code via Haskell.

I would like to thank Alan Jeffrey (@asaj ) for his expert advice regarding compiling Haskell to Agda, which proved to be crucial.

I will add a comment to the Agda files at an appropriate place with the acknowledgment. Sorry I didn't do this already, Alan. But this is a nice example of social media helping research (there are many others, of course).

title: A First Person Account Of Life As An Autistic Adult

last_post.content:
People with Autism Spectrum Disorders (ASD) are all around us—they’re integrated in schools and the workforce. But for many of us, all we know about ASD are the news stories speculating about a diagnosis for a violent mass shooter or a savant with remarkable skills.

We rarely hear directly from people with autism. In today's The Big Picture, we change that. Read more at #TheBigPicture: https://thinkbigpicture.substack.com/p/autism-spectrum-disorder-adult-life

“And that for me, right now, is the allure of #Mastodon…It’s a re-calibration to a more human scale I desperately needed. My tweets were getting lost in all the noise for many years, but on Mastodon I’m finding connection again, folks are actually responding, conversations are happening, and there’s a growing sense of community. That’s what I signed-on to Twitter for 16+ years ago, and I’m realizing I missed it."

An interview with Emeka Ogboh, who makes music with field recordings of city streets, markets, vendors, and traffic from his hometown of Lagos, Nigeria.

"A lot of people just use just their ears when they're making music, but I put my body into it. How does it make my body feel? So that’s what I learned from sound installation and why I kind of had this gut feeling that I could make music, that I could compose."

title: Meta Says Users Spent 24% More Time on Instagram Because of Reels

last_post.content:
Due to Reels, people are spending 24% more time on Instagram.

But there’s a caveat here. Reels is actually Instagram’s revenue potential.

I don’t care whether Instagram is making more or less money for Meta—but perhaps people are spending more time on Reels because Instagram isn’t trying to monetize them yet!

@DervPerv Another hint that I use a lot, is to replace `*` with `?` for one exact character.

Examples:

<one character>靡 = `?靡` - https://jisho.org/search/%3F%E9%9D%A1
Returns: `風靡`, `淫靡`, `萎靡`

<three characters>靡 = `???靡` - https://jisho.org/search/%3F%3F%3F%E9%9D%A1
Returns: `一世風靡`

I love using this one when I know exactly where the kanji appears and how many characters the word has 😃

@DervPerv Another hint that I use a lot, is to replace `*` with `?` for one exact character.

The directory of https://fediverse.info just got an update!

What is that?

An opt-in search engine for topics and people. If you're looking for a fresh new way to discover the Fediverse, this is the place.

Made by @dansup, an API is being developed so that different Fediverse server software such as Pixelfed, Mastodon, and Calckey can utilize it for social discovery and recommendations.

Check it out here:

https://fediverse.info/explore/people

@fediversenews

It's beautiful 😍

title: The End of Trans America Comes Into Focus

last_post.content:
** CW – The Fascist Assault on Trans America **

This is not alarmist, just stark reality: genocide is looming, so take action NOW. Not your problem? If you tolerate this, then your children will be next.

The #fascists are real, they're making headway, and it's impossible to be too concerned. You think #genocide "can't happen here"? Think again, it’s already underway. Stop it before it is too late: protect trans people and allies, support anti-fascists, write media and pols, protest everywhere, boycott fascist sympathizers and bank-rollers. Be persistent and LOUD about it.

"The terror, hopelessness, and despair within the trans community over the laws and policies forcing them to leave or detransition is palpable. We see young trans people choosing between the futures they hoped for and survival. For some it is too much, and all signs point to a dramatic rise in suicides. Yet still, it will not be enough to achieve the GOP goal".

title: Anaconda Installer Partitioning and Storage Survey Results - Fedora Magazine

last_post.content:
You want some Anaconda Installer news?

Check out the results of the Anaconda survey we did a while back! Thanks to you, we got 1,269 responses that help us understand how to develop the redesign.

70% of respondents preferred some kind of auto-partioning, but when asked about next steps for development, the second most important consideration was maintaining an "ability to customize details of partitioning."
#Fedora #Linux #AnacondaInstaller

Read more: https://fedoramagazine.org/anaconda-installer-partitioning-and-storage-survey-results/
